ActorTalk: Jos, I need your help.
...Tch. I'm not telling you anything.
I'll report your cooperation truthfully to the authorities. The more you talk, the better it'll be for you.
Don't know.
Heh. This is a waste of time. Hand her over and I'll make her talk.
Jos, you know who's standing next to me, don't you?
I-I don't know.
[PlayerName], I'm feeling a little thirsty. Go grab me an electrolyte drink.
Just get it from somewhere nearby. By the time you're back, I should be about done here.
Alright, just the two of us now. Let me think... how should we spend this time together?
W-what are you going to do?
You know, even the most tight-lipped people can't help but whimper when a sharp lance tears through their throat.
People like you always think you're more important than you are, like keeping a few secrets will make the world see you as some kind of martyr.
But the truth is, there are seven or eight more scumbags waiting their turn in that cell. If the ones up front stay quiet, I'll start slitting throats so the rest can hear it loud and clear...
Stay back! Don't hurt me!
Someone always breaks and gives me the answers. And when they do, the ones who died before them? All for nothing.
I-I'll tell you everything, please!
Well, there is something, but...
Hmm?
B-but every time we met, it was near Sequence Square. They'd blindfold us and lead us through an underground passage to a dark room...
How long does it take to get there from Sequence Square?
About... ten minutes or so.
Anything unusual around that dark room? Like the decor, the setting, anything at all?
I've only been there twice. All I remember is that it was big, dark, kind of like a warehouse...
As for the setting... I vaguely remember hearing jazz music coming from upstairs last time.
...Jazz music? Anything else?
I... I've told you everything I know. Please, just let me go...
Tch. One more whimper out of you and I'll really slit your throat.
Sit there and stay quiet until [PlayerName] gets back.
Thank you, Vera.
Dealing with a coward like her was no trouble. Better than those idiots who make me get blood all over myself.
Back to business. Based on the information we got, there's only one place that fits the profile in the whole Commercial District...
Then let's go ask the manager directly and see what he has to say.
I was just doing a job for money. I don't know anything else... I swear! I'm telling the truth!
It's Hertha from the Flourish Guild. I only joined recently. Just delivered a few threatening letters, that's all!
Exactly. And if Jos is right, that secret base should be right under Stella Brew.
Aren't you close with the owner of that shop? Has he ever mentioned any kind of hidden passage in there?
Did you get hit by a car on your way back? Are you saying they started at Sequence Square, walked in a circle, and ended up right back where they started?
Who are you working for?
Why are you interfering with the development plans?
Do you have a fixed base?
I'm trying to help you.
If you don't start talking, you're going to regret it.
Stella Brew.
Kuroro Coffee.
Sequence Square.
Alright, let's go.
I've never heard of any underground facility at Stella Brew.
I know that place pretty well. I don't think there's anything like that.
